name: SubmenuButton
desc: A menu button that displays a cascading menu.

fields.name: onHover
fields.desc: Called when a pointer enters or exits the button response area.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: Handler called when the focus changes.

fields.name: onOpen
fields.desc: A callback that is invoked when the menu is opened.

fields.name: onClose
fields.desc: A callback that is invoked when the menu is closed.

fields.name: menuStyle
fields.desc: The [MenuStyle] of the menu specified by [menuChildren].

fields.name: alignmentOffset
fields.desc: The offset of the menu relative to the alignment origin determined by [MenuStyle.alignment] on the [style] attribute.

fields.name: leadingIcon
fields.desc: An optional icon to display before the [child].

fields.name: submenuIcon
fields.desc: If provided, the widget replaces the default [SubmenuButton] arrow icon.

fields.name: trailingIcon
fields.desc: An optional icon to display after the [child].

fields.name: menuChildren
fields.desc: The list of widgets that appear in the menu when it is opened.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget displayed in the middle portion of this button.
